caption.title: Cumulative detected incidence at the end of year 22 for nine simulated epidemics.
caption.p: Each polygon represents one peach orchard. From left to right, the number of introduction patches (with initial disease prevalence) are: 1 (25%), 15 (2%) and 30 (1%). From top to bottom: simulations generated under short-, medium- and long-range kernel scenarios.
